## Graphics.AddMetafileComment method

Adds a comment to the current Metafile.

```csharp
public void AddMetafileComment(byte[] data)
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| data | Byte[] | Array of bytes that contains the comment. |
